title: Dermalogica Daily Microfoliant, 2.6-Ounce
description: This unique Rice-based powder formula activates upon contact with water, releasing Papain, Salicylic Acid and Rice Enzymes that micro-exfoliate dead cells, instantly leaving skin smoother and brighter.  The unique Skin Brightening Complex of Aspergillus, Grapefruit and Licorice helps to balance uneven skin pigmentation while a super-smoothing blend of Green Tea, Ginkgo and Colloidal Oatmeal helps to calm the skin, leaving it extraordinarily clear and refreshed.  Gentle enough to use on a daily basis.

title: Physicians Formula Eye Booster 2-in-1 Lash Boosting Eyeliner + Serum Ultra Black 0.2 Oz
description: High-tech formula enhances the appearance of lashes while providing the instant definition of a liquid eyeliner, in one easy step!  Lash Boosting complex targets the base of lashes where it is most effective.

title: It's So BIG Volumizing Mascara (Black) by Elizabeth Mott Net Weight 0.33 fl oz/10ml
description: After years of disappointing mascaras, that failed to deliver what they were supposed to do, I searched all over the world to create a mascara that gave me BIG volume. Working with the top cosmetics laboratories, I formulated the perfect volumizing mascara that didn't smudge and can be worn all day. I wear this mascara to the gym (shhh, it's a secret!), and it will not budge even after a long run or spinning class!The secret weapon:The hourglass brush shape, with its long and short bristle pattern, delivers just the right amount of mascara to each lash (like magic!), watch your lashes grow BIGGER with each layer.We are proud to be cruelty-free!
